Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a tapped 2/2 blue Drake Construct artifact creature token with flying. That token doesn't untap during your untap step for as long as you control Eli. This ability triggers only once each turn.
{1}{U}, Sacrifice a creature: Copy target instant or sorcery spell with mana value 3 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.
